title: Kantek Clear Acrylic Telephone Stand, 10.2"W x 9.5"D x 4.7"H, Desk Phone Holder, Non-Skid Feet, Heavy Duty, Office Organizer, Desk Accessory
features: Telephone Stand measures 10.2" W x 9.5" D x 4.7" H
Angled design for easy access, conserves desk space and allows under phone storage
Heavy cast clear polished acrylic combines elegance and durability
Non skid feet keeps it scurely in position on your desk top
Part of the Kantek acrylic desk accessory collection
description: The Kantek Angled Telephone Stand places a phone at an angle for easy dialing, reducing neck and eye strain. Made from heavy cast clear acrylic, each stand supports all phone sizes. A storage area underneath provides room for office supplies, keeping desk more organized. This one-piece stand has non-skid feet to prevent your phone from falling off of surfaces, so you don't have to worry about accidents disrupting your workday. About us: - Founded in 1982 as one of the first manufacturers of Anti-Glare Filters for personal computers, Kantek has always been an industry pioneer. Focusing on the needs of our customers, amid a rapidly changing marketplace, has led to our continued growth with an ever expanding and evolving product line.
